Talonflame

Type HP Attack Defense Speed Special Attack Special Defense Total
78 81 71 126 74 69 499
#329 0' 4.7"
54.01 lbs. 		Scorching Pokémon In the fever of an exciting battle, it showers embers from the gaps between its feathers and takes to the air. It finishes its prey off with a colossal kick.

Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Cost Description
1 Flame Body 27 Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.
10 Heatproof 2 The heatproof body of the Pokémon halves the damage from Fire-type moves that hit it.
25 Early Bird 1 The Pokémon awakens from sleep twice as fast as other Pokémon.
40 Unburden 28 Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon's held item is used or lost.
55 Gale Wings 70 Gives priority to Flying-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is full.
70 Wind Rider 54 Blocks wind moves. Attack is boosted from Tailwind or when hit by a wind move.
85 Screen Cleaner 12 Entering a battle nullifies the effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil.
100 Aerilate 68 Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Cost Description
Disc 06 Keen Eye 6 Prevents other Pokémon from lowering this Pokémon's accuracy.
Disc 07 Illuminate 11 Raises the Pokémon's evasiveness.
Disc 11 Ball Fetch 0 If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the first failed thrown Poké Ball.
Disc 17 Wind Rider 54 Blocks wind moves. Attack is boosted from Tailwind or when hit by a wind move.
Disc 25 Levitate 26 By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
Disc 48 Flare Boost 60 Powers up special attacks when the Pokémon is burned.
Disc 49 Frost Boost 60 Powers up special attacks when the Pokémon is frostbitten.
Disc 61 Unburden 28 Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon's held item is used or lost.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Cost Description
Aerilate 68 Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Big Pecks 6 Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering effects.
Defeatist -54 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Early Bird 1 The Pokémon awakens from sleep twice as fast as other Pokémon.
Flash Fire 25 Powers up the Pokémon's Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.
Gale Wings 70 Gives priority to Flying-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is full.
Heatproof 2 The heatproof body of the Pokémon halves the damage from Fire-type moves that hit it.
Klutz -39 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Pickup 1 The Pokémon may pick up the items, both during and outside of battle.
Predictable -1 This Pokémon's predictable maneuvers make moves hit against it without fail.
Quick Feet 27 Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.
Screen Cleaner 12 Entering a battle nullifies the effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil.
Slow Start -75 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Truant -74 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Weak Bones -14 Halves the Pokémon's Defense stat.
Aerodynamic 45 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat on Blustery Winds.
Calderize 68 Normal-type moves become Fire-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Flame Body 27 Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.
Magma Armor 11 The Pokémon is covered with hot magma, which prevents it from becoming frostbitten.
Wind Power 11 When hit by a wind move, the Pokémon becomes Charged up.
Air Lock 27 Eliminates the effects of weather.
Convection 49 The Pokémon generates blustery winds when it's hit by an attack.
Pressure System 75 The Pokémon generates blustery winds when it enters battle.
Primal Prancer 51 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat on Primal Terrain.
Sheer Force 71 Removes additional effects to increase the power of moves when attacking.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
